data.title: Who won Kentucky Derby 2024? FULL results and finishing order for 6.57 Churchill Downs showpiece
data.meta_description: MYSTIK DAN has won the 150th edition of the iconic Kentucky Derby.We'll bring you how every horse finished below, and check out Sun Racing'sKent
data.text:
Scroll down to find out how every horse finished at Churchill Downs

MYSTIK DAN has won the 150th edition of the iconic Kentucky Derby.

We'll bring you how every horse finished below, and check out Sun Racing's Kentucky Derby live blog for the latest race reaction.

6.57 Kentucky Derby full results

1 Mystik Dan 18/1

2 Sierra Leone 11/4

3 Forever Young 6/1

4 Catching Freedom 15/2

5 T O Password 40/1

6 Resilience 25/1

7 Stronghold 40/1

Most read in Horse Racing

8 Honor Marie 20/1

9 Endlessly 40/1

10 Dornoch 25/1

11 Track Phantom 40/1

12 West Saratoga 66/1

13 Domestic Product 20/1

14 Epic Ride 66/1

15 Fierceness 3/1

16 Society Man 40/1

17 Just Steel 25/1

18 Grand Mo The First 80/1

19 Catalytic 40/1

20 Just A Touch 10/1

Kentucky Derby 2024 prize money

The total prize pot for this year's mammoth race at Churchill Downs is a staggering $5million.

Here is the full breakdown:

Winner: $3.1m

2nd place: $1m

3rd place: $500k

4th place: $250k

5th place: $150k

What TV channel is the Kentucky Derby on and can it be live streamed?

The Kentucky Derby will be aired live on NBC.

You can live stream the race on the Peacock app/website.

Alternatively, SunSport will bring you how every horse finished in this year's Kentucky Derby.

Responsible gambling

Remember to gamble responsibly

A responsible gambler is someone who:

Establishes time and monetary limits before playing

Only gambles with money they can afford to lose

Never chase their losses

Doesn’t gamble if they’re upset, angry, or depressed

National Council on Problem Gambling – https://www.ncpgambling.org/

Gamble Aware – www.begambleaware.org

For help with a gambling problem, call the National Gambling Helpline on 1-800-522-4700 or go to ncpgambling.org/chat
